page.title: 07Religion in South Bradford.
page.content:
There are many religions in South Bradford.The majority of the population are members of a{Protestant religion but many of these do not attend a church.The{Muslim}religion is very strong in the area and because they have no{Mosques}they have converted several terrace houses for this purpose.Some of the Protestant chuches in the area have been demolished or have changed their use because of a fall in attendance.
{SCHOOL PROTESTANT MUSLIM OTHERS E.Bierley First 74 0 1 Holme Middle 335 5 10 St.Matthews First 143 55 23 Ryan Middle 141 153 28
